I used to chew tobbaco from past 30 years and my mouth opening is very restricted, 
On my very first visit Doctor explained me about further damage which is going to happen if I continue having tobbaco, the way he explained is very nice and his behaviour is very courteous,and very friendly.
While extraction of ü¶∑ he made me very comfortable inspite of himself having to struggle because of my restricted mouth opening.

Definitely will suggest this place to family and friends

I was also impressed by the staff there. I highly recommend Dr Dinesh. You can blindly trust him and go for the treatment.
